New Records: LeBron James passed John Stockton for fifth-most games played in NBA history
LeBron James recorded 23 points, 8 rebounds, and 9 assists in the game
Key Match Events: Los Angeles Lakers defeated New Orleans Pelicans with a score of 104-99
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James was entering the game with averages of 23.5 points, 8.8 rebounds, and 9.6 assists per contest
Los Angeles Lakers were in the middle of a four-game winning streak and the fifth seed in the Western Conference
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers' win extended their momentum and strengthened their playoff position
LeBron James' milestone achievement highlighted the game's significance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked a historical moment for LeBron James' career
The Lakers' victory was a crucial step toward their playoff aspirations
